meanings.definition: To act in a particular way
meanings.sent1: She was behaving very well during the class.
meanings.sent2: The children were behaving at the party.
meanings.sent3: The dog was behaving like a little gentleman at the park.
meanings.sent4: The engine was behaving smoothly after the repair.
meanings.sent5: The robot was behaving exactly as programmed.

meanings.definition: To conduct oneself in a specified manner
meanings.sent1: He is behaving according to the rules of the game.
meanings.sent2: The students were behaving respectfully in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat was behaving as if it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The car was behaving like a racehorse on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The machine was behaving as if it had a mind of its own.

meanings.definition: To function or operate in a specified way
meanings.sent1: The computer was behaving strangely after the update.
meanings.sent2: The old clock was behaving erratically, ticking at odd times.
meanings.sent3: The phone was behaving like a mischievous child, ringing at random moments.
meanings.sent4: The weather was behaving unpredictably, changing from sunny to rainy in minutes.
meanings.sent5: The car was behaving like a loyal companion, never breaking down on long trips.
